author: Dawn A
text: 'Quick seating

text: "This place was so packed with obnoxious kids in their early 20's

Bar menu was solid. If I lived in the city and did this city bar life stuff I would come here after work to throw a few back.'

text: 'It‚Äôs a fun place

But why do you give out an inaccurate menu? I wonder how many drunk people they get away with overcharging.'

'Such a great find

text: 'Customer beware: They will charge a 20% open tab fee on your entire bar tab and make a point not to inform you. Avoid the mistake of tipping on top of your total bill. It makes no sense as to why you would put a 20% fee on leaving your tab ‚Ä¶'
